  Learning new things daily

Full Page Ads

Read/WriteWeb’s Marshall Kirkpatrick writes,

While the self-publishing revolution brought on by blogs was supposed to challenge the push-advertising model as well, it seems that push-advertising will not go down without a fight. I expect that many bloggers will welcome AdBright’s new full-page ads.

This blog is not a business, so it is easier for me to say this, but if a blog owners respects their users, they will not use this type of advertising. Blogging is changing the face of media, lets hope we will see the same thing for ads.

I am not against making money via blogging, but IMO, this should not come at the expense of the user experience. These types of ads are horrible.

Posted on Oct 15, 2007 and tagged as advertising, blogging
